description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

v0.3.0.description:
Additions:
-Added Mastermind Tactics as additional checks for mid-game.
-You now start with a random "Base" set (Core Set, Villains, Marvel Studios' Phase 1, Marvel Studios What if...?) instead of always starting with Core Set. You will only start with a base set that you have enabled in the yaml options.

Changes:
-Renamed most masterminds removing the set from their name. Exceptions are Thanos, Loki and Red Skull because they are in multiple sets.

Known Issues:
-Marvel Studios Phase 1 reprinted the Loki and Red Skull masterminds from the Core Set and if you have both enabled you may be required to fight them twice.
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.4.0.description:
Additions:
 - Heroes are now individual unlocks instead of being unlocked from sets.
 - You now start with 5 random heroes unlocked.
 - Added Optional Traps (Play 1 Villain Deck Card, Discard 1 Card, KO 1 Non-Grey Card, 1 Villain Escapes)
 - Added "Bonus" Filler Items (Draw 1 Card, KO 1 Card, Place 1 Bystander on Villain Deck)
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
You now start with 8 heroes unlocked instead of 5 so that you can deal with several schemes that require up to that amount of heroes. This means that Generating with only Marvel Studios Phase 1 is no longer possible, if using that base set you need at least 1 other set alongside of it to play. 

Current workaround "Rule" is that if a scheme or mastermind asks you to use a hero or combination of heroes you do not have unlocked yet, use what you have to the best of your ability and add in your not unlocked heroes if needed.
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1
